definition[0]: to reach or achieve a particular number or amount
example[0]: The Dodgers have clocked up six wins in a row.
example[1]: I clocked up 90,000 miles in my Ford.
example[2]: Councillor Scott has clocked up more than 25 years on the borough council.
definition[1]: to reach a particular number or amount
example[3]: Thomas has clocked up 40 years service with the company.
